inclusion.criterion: Patient planned for Whipple's surgery or total pancreatic resection
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Cardiac disease, including congestive heart failure (NYHA II-IV), myocardial infarction, valvular heart disease or atrial fibrillation
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Neurologic disease considered to affect cerebral blood flow, including dementia, epilepsy, and apoplexy
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Intake of moclobemide, isocarboxazid or tricyclic antidepressants
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: patient reported no use of lipid-lowering medications

notes: Patient has severe stenosis in the left internal carotid artery and moderate stenosis in the right internal carotid artery, but no other cardiovascular risk factors mentioned.
